Package utilities

Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
utilities.Matrix
public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
matrix class for neural network
Version:
1.2
Author:
Physic Dev

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      return a text representation of the matrix.
      The representation look like this :

      | 0.0 0.1 0.2 |
      | 1.0 1.1 1.2 |
      | 2.0 2.1 2.2 |

      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      a String representation of the matrix
      Since:
      1.0

    • fusion

      public void fusion​(Matrix m) throws java.lang.ArithmeticException
      not realy a matrix operation but usefull in neural network calculation.
      like the matrix sum but multiply the elements.
      Parameters:
      m - the matrix to fuse
      Throws:
      java.lang.ArithmeticException - if the matrix doesn't have the same size
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      add(Matrix), substract(Matrix), product(Matrix), factor(float)
